original: Danils, Olof L:son, agronom, direktör, Åtvidaberg, f. 22/1/73 i Malung, Kopparb. 1., av Danils Lars Halvarsson o. Kerstin Jonsdotter. G. 07 m. Elin Lindskog. Barn: Halvar f. 08, kapt. v. L 4, Gunnel 10, g. Åslund. — Örebro tekn. gymn. 94, Alnarps lant-br:inst. 96, Alnarps mejeriinst. 97. Stud. v. univ. i Halle, mejeriinst. i Hameln o. Dairy Inst. i Kilmarnock 98. Stat. elev i mejerihushålln. 01-03, förest, f. Åtvidabergs Mejeri o. me-jerisk. 04, mejeridisp. i Åtvidabergs Mejeri A-B 04, verkst. dir. där sed. 42. Sekr. i Åtvidabergs Mejeri A-B 05, v. ordf. i östergötl. 1. mejeriförb. 33, led. av komm:-, munic:- o. kyr-kofullm., kyrkoråd, munic :nd o. fas-tigh:nd, kyrkvärd, kronoomb. i tax:-nd. Skr.: Om mjölkning (03). Patrst-GM.
translated: Danils, Olof L:son, agronom, director, Åtvidaberg, b. January 22, 1873 in Malung, Kopparb. County 1st district, son of Danils Lars Halvarsson and Kerstin Jonsdotter. Married in 1907 to Elin Lindskog. Children: Halvar b. 1908, captain in L 4, Gunnel b. 1910, married Åslund. He attended Örebro technical gymnasium in 1894, Alnarp agricultural institute in 1896, and Alnarp dairy institute in 1897. He studied at the University of Halle and at the Dairy Institute in Hameln and Kilmarnock in 1898. He was a student in dairy household management from 1901-1903, then became the manager of Åtvidabergs Mejeri and dairy supervisor in 1904. He became the dairy director of Åtvidabergs Mejeri A-B in 1904, and was later its managing director. He served as secretary of Åtvidabergs Mejeri A-B in 1905, vice chairman of the East Gothia 1st Dairy Association in 1933, and member of the municipal council, church council, municipal board, property board, churchwarden, and member of the tax commission. He wrote about milking in his book "Om mjölkning" (1903). He has received the Patriotic Society's medal.

structured.name: Olof L. Danils
structured.description: Olof L. Danils was a Swedish agronom and director. He was born on January 22, 1873 in Malung, Kopparb. County, Sweden. He was the son of Danils Lars Halvarsson and Kerstin Jonsdotter. He married Elin Lindskog in 1907 and they had two children, Halvar and Gunnel. Olof L. Danils attended Örebro Technical Gymnasium, Alnarp Agricultural Institute, and Alnarp Dairy Institute. He also studied at the University of Halle and at the Dairy Institute in Hameln and Kilmarnock. He wrote a book about milking in 1903 and received the Patriotic Society's medal.
